name: Mars Voyagers
description:
Mars Voyagers is a single player, 2D video game that involves space exploration and problem solving through easy missions that allow the user to have a sneak peak of what it is to be inside a spacecraft with a set course to Mars.

The challenges in matter involve the user to take action based on what is best for the astronaut on board. Our main goal is to entertain, inspire and educate the audience through the journey of being an astronaut in outer space.

This video game is a great tool for aspiring astronauts and young minds that would like to pursue a career related to space exploration, engineering or any bioscience that could be applied in this type of situation.

Download the zip, decompress it and click the file that says Almond.exe

You will be able to play it within a couple of minutes!
